ED_Title: Appointment of the Under-Secretary-General for Internal Oversight Services
ED_DecisionText: At its 2nd plenary meeting, on 13 September 2024, the General Assembly approved, notwithstanding resolution 48/218 B of 29 July 1994, the exceptional extension by the Secretary-General (footnote: A/79/286.) of the term of Fatoumata Ndiaye as Under-Secretary-General for Internal Oversight Services by two years, until 24 October 2026.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/79/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
